full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Reference
WS4290823072-Doc4290846277
## Title (English)
Optimization of the heating and cooling system at Maurice-Lamontagne Institute
## Title (French)
Optimisation du système de chauffage et de refroidissement à l’Institut Maurice-Lamontagne
## Publication and Closing Dates
* **Publication Date**: November 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, November 29, 2023, @ 2:00:00 PM EST

## Tender Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting proposals for the construction work in plumbing, electricity, and regulation for the optimization of the heating and cooling system at the Maurice-Lamontagne Institute. The project involves a comprehensive assessment, design, and installation of a new heating and cooling system to enhance the overall indoor environment and energy efficiency of the institute.

## Eligibility
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is open to all qualified contractors with relevant expertise and experience in delivering similar projects.

## Tender Method
This is a competitive process, where the successful contractor will be selected based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity
* **Mont-Joli**, the project location, is the only region of opportunity for this tender.
## Contracting Entity Details
* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contract Contact
For more information, please contact Veronique Hae Ok Pichette at [veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit the official website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17910789?extsite=MTc5MTA3ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17910789?extsite=MTc5MTA3ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  ^{1}
